com.bigdata.journal

Interface IIndexManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICounterSetAccess, IGISTManager, IIndexStore
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBigdataFederation<T>, IBTreeManager, IHAJournal, IJournal
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDistributedFederation, AbstractFederation, AbstractJournal, AbstractResourceManagerTestCase.MockFederation, AbstractScaleOutFederation, EmbeddedFederation, Journal, JournalDelegate, StoreManager.ManagedJournal, TemporaryStore

    public interface IIndexManager
extends IIndexStore, IGISTManager, ICounterSetAccess
    Interface for managing named indices.
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IIndex getIndex(String name, long timestamp)
      Return a view of the named index as of the specified timestamp.
      boolean isGroupCommit()
      Return true if the index manager supports group commit semantics.

    • Method Detail

      • getIndex

        IIndex getIndex(String name,
              long timestamp)
        Return a view of the named index as of the specified timestamp.
        Parameters:
        name - The index name.
        timestamp - A timestamp which represents either a possible commit time on the store or a read-only transaction identifier.
        Returns:
        The index or null iff there is no index registered with that name for that timestamp.
        See Also:
        IGISTLocalManager.getIndexLocal(String, long)

      • isGroupCommit

        boolean isGroupCommit()
        Return true if the index manager supports group commit semantics.
        See Also:
        (NSS GROUP COMMIT)
